languages.text: {n}Глейто тоже изранен: на шкуре алеют порезы и ожоги, один визор разбит. В ровной стойке кибермастифа нет и намека на испытываемую боль — если он вообще может ее чувствовать.{/n}

{n}You spot just as many wounds on Glaito: there are burns and cuts all over the coat, and one of the visors is broken. And yet, there is nothing in the cyber-mastiff's straight posture that would indicate pain — if pain is even something this dog can feel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Глейто тоже изранен: на шкуре алеют порезы и ожоги, один визор разбит. В ровной стойке кибермастифа нет и намека на испытываемую боль — если он вообще может ее чувствовать.{/n}

{n}You spot just as many wounds on Glaito: there are burns and cuts all over the coat, and one of the visors is broken. And yet, there is nothing in the cyber-mastiff's straight posture that would indicate pain — if pain is even something this dog can feel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito ist ähnlich schwer verletzt. Er hat zahlreiche Verbrennungen und Schnitte. Außerdem ist einer seiner Visoren geborsten. Trotzdem deutet an der aufrechten Haltung des Cyber-Mastiffs nichts auf Schmerzen hin ... sofern dieser Hund überhaupt Schmerz empfindet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You spot just as many wounds on Glaito: there are burns and cuts all over the coat, and one of the visors is broken. And yet, there is nothing in the cyber-mastiff's straight posture that would indicate pain — if pain is even something this dog can feel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito ist ähnlich schwer verletzt. Er hat zahlreiche Verbrennungen und Schnitte. Außerdem ist einer seiner Visoren geborsten. Trotzdem deutet an der aufrechten Haltung des Cyber-Mastiffs nichts auf Schmerzen hin ... sofern dieser Hund überhaupt Schmerz empfindet."

languages.text: {n}Vous remarquez tout autant de blessures sur Glaito. Son pelage est brûlé et couvert de lacérations. L'une de ses visières est également brisée. Et pourtant, rien dans la posture du cyber-mastiff ne laisse transparaître la douleur, si tant est que ce chien soit capable de la ressentir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You spot just as many wounds on Glaito: there are burns and cuts all over the coat, and one of the visors is broken. And yet, there is nothing in the cyber-mastiff's straight posture that would indicate pain — if pain is even something this dog can feel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous remarquez tout autant de blessures sur Glaito. Son pelage est brûlé et couvert de lacérations. L'une de ses visières est également brisée. Et pourtant, rien dans la posture du cyber-mastiff ne laisse transparaître la douleur, si tant est que ce chien soit capable de la ressentir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Distingues una cantidad similar de heridas en Glaito: tiene el pelaje lleno de quemaduras y cortes, y una de las lentes de su visor está rota. Y aun así, no ves nada en la postura estirada del cibermastín que sugiera dolor... si es que el animal es capaz siquiera de sentir dolor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You spot just as many wounds on Glaito: there are burns and cuts all over the coat, and one of the visors is broken. And yet, there is nothing in the cyber-mastiff's straight posture that would indicate pain — if pain is even something this dog can feel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Distingues una cantidad similar de heridas en Glaito: tiene el pelaje lleno de quemaduras y cortes, y una de las lentes de su visor está rota. Y aun así, no ves nada en la postura estirada del cibermastín que sugiera dolor... si es que el animal es capaz siquiera de sentir dolor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}格雷托身上也伤痕累累，满是烧伤与割伤的痕迹，其中一块面甲也被打坏了。然而，这只生化獒犬依然雄姿勃勃，没有任何疼痛的迹象。事实上，这只狗完全感觉不到疼痛。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You spot just as many wounds on Glaito: there are burns and cuts all over the coat, and one of the visors is broken. And yet, there is nothing in the cyber-mastiff's straight posture that would indicate pain — if pain is even something this dog can feel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}格雷托身上也伤痕累累，满是烧伤与割伤的痕迹，其中一块面甲也被打坏了。然而，这只生化獒犬依然雄姿勃勃，没有任何疼痛的迹象。事实上，这只狗完全感觉不到疼痛。{/n}

languages.text: {n}グライトにも同じくらいの傷があるのが目に入った—表皮のあちこちに火傷や切り傷があり、バイザーの一つは壊れている。それでも、サイバーマスチフのまっすぐな姿勢には、痛みを感じているような素振りはまったく見られない。そもそも、この犬に痛みという感覚があるのかどうかすら疑わしいが。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You spot just as many wounds on Glaito: there are burns and cuts all over the coat, and one of the visors is broken. And yet, there is nothing in the cyber-mastiff's straight posture that would indicate pain — if pain is even something this dog can feel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}グライトにも同じくらいの傷があるのが目に入った—表皮のあちこちに火傷や切り傷があり、バイザーの一つは壊れている。それでも、サイバーマスチフのまっすぐな姿勢には、痛みを感じているような素振りはまったく見られない。そもそも、この犬に痛みという感覚があるのかどうかすら疑わしいが。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito'nun da Solomorne'dan geri kalır yanı yok. Üzerindeki kaplama, kesiklerle ve yanıklarla dolu; vizörlerinden biri de kırılmış. Sağlam duruşunu koruyan siber mastif, hiç acı emaresi göstermiyor. Gerçi acı hissedip hissetmediği belli değil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You spot just as many wounds on Glaito: there are burns and cuts all over the coat, and one of the visors is broken. And yet, there is nothing in the cyber-mastiff's straight posture that would indicate pain — if pain is even something this dog can feel.{/n}
